text: Pargev Vardanian (; born 7 June 1996), known professionally as Parg (; stylised in all caps), is an Armenian singer and songwriter. He represented Armenia in the Eurovision Song Contest 2025 with the song "Survivor". He finished in 20th place in the final with 72 points. ==Discography== ===Extended plays=== Title Details Theatre Session (Live Edition) * Released: 18 March 2023 * Label: Self-released * Formats: Digital download, streaming ===Singles=== Title Year Peak chart positions Album LTU UK Down.
